required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: First in Human Study of TORL-1-23 in Participants With Advanced Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, First in Human, Dose-Escalation Study of TORL-1-23 in Participants With Advanced Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This first-in-human study will evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and antitumor activity of TORL-1-23 in patients with advanced cancer

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events and serious adverse events
primary_outcome.description: Incidence and severity of adverse events, serious adverse events, according to NCI-CTCAE Version 5.0
Highest administered dose with < 33% participants experiencing dose limiting toxicity (DLT) in the first 6 DLT evaluable participants
Based on the maximum tolerated dose, cumulative safety, and pharmacokinetic data

secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with best response of complete response (CR) or partial response (PR) according to RECIST 1.1
Time from CR or PR to objective disease progression or death to any cause
PFS is defined as the time from the start of the treatment until objective disease progression or death from any cause
Time from start of treatment to complete response or partial response
Proportion of participants alive at 1 year from the start of treatment to death from any cause
Proportion of participants alive at 2 years from the start of treatment to death from any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of anti-drug antibody (ADA) Positive Participants
secondary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity will be measured by the number of participants that are ADA positive.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Serum Concentration of TORL-1-23 at Steady State (Cmax,ss)
Minimum Serum Concentration of TORL-1-23 at Steady State (Cmin,ss)
Time of Maximum Serum Concentration of TORL-1-23 (Tmax)
Time of Minimum Serum Concentration of TORL-1-23 (Tmin)
Time of Minimum Serum Concentration of TORL-1-23 at Steady State (Tmin,ss)
Area under the Serum Concentration-Time curve from the time of dosing to the last measurable concentration (AUClast) for TORL-1-23
Area under the Serum Concentration-Time curve from the time of dosing extrapolated to time infinity (AUCinf) for TORL-1-23
Apparent volume of distribution during the terminal phase (Vz) of TORL-1-23

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Advanced solid tumor
- Measurable disease, per RECIST v1.1
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
Exclusion Criteria:
- Has not recovered [recovery is defined as NCI CTCAE, version 5.0, grade â‰¤1] from the acute toxicities of previous therapy, except treatment-related alopecia or laboratory abnormalities otherwise meeting eligibility requirements
- Received prior chemotherapeutic, investigational, or other therapies for the treatment of cancer within 14 days with small molecule and within 28 days with biologic before the first dose of TORL-1-23
- Progressive or symptomatic brain metastases
- Serious, uncontrolled medical disorder, nonmalignant systemic disease, or active, uncontrolled infection
- History of significant cardiac disease
- History of myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) or AML
- History of another cancer within 3 years before Day 1 of study treatment, with the exception of basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin that has been definitively treated. A history of other malignancies with a low risk of recurrence, including appropriately treated ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) of the breast and prostate cancer with a Gleason score less than or equal to 6, are also not excluded
- If female, is pregnant or breastfeeding
